describe.name: Depoorter Franck
describe.address: 29 rue de la Pannerie, 59840 Pérenchies, France

aboutme.about1: Curious, persevering and autonomous, former social mediator, I had the chance to practice different aspects of mediation. This allowed me to acquire different skills over the years but above all human values. After 15 years, I decided to reconvert myself as a web developer.
aboutme.dev: After several diplomas in the social field, when I chose to retrain, I chose the Wild Code School in Lille, labeled Grande Ecole du Numérique, which uses reverse pedagogy and allows me to work on different projects (including a real client) at the within different teams in agile methodology (SCRUM). It is an intensive 5 and 3 month training where we focus on mutual aid, research and the development of each person's autonomy.

card.describeReact: Use of the React library for the front-end part. React is a technology for developing web applications or web sites
card.describeVue: Use of the Vue library (scalable framework) for the front-end part. Facilitate integration with other libraries or existing projects
card.describePhp: PHP is one of the most used languages ​​to create dynamic web pages. It allows to display data dynamically, to process forms or to connect to a database.
card.describeSymfony: Symfony is a powerful PHP Framework developed by Sensiolabs, a French company. It is an open source full-stack MVC (Model-View-Controller) application very useful for the development of scalable and very secure Web applications
card.describeNode: Use of the free software platform Node.js for the back-end part. Added to this the Express framework to improve productivity.
card.describeMysql: Use of SQL language for the exploitation of databases. DB-Eaver database management.
card.describeHtml: Use of the latest version of HTML language for the construction of web app, app, website, all associated with CSS and Javascript languages.
card.describeCss: Use of the latest version of the CSS language for the construction of web app, app, website, all associated with HTML and Javascript languages.
card.describeJs: Use of the latest standardized version ES12 with React, node.js or alone for the construction of web app, app, website, all associated with HTML and CSS languages.

project1.title: Goodealmaps
project1.describe: End of training project of 3 months, a site grouping the sharing of good plan on France

project2.title: Vinoteam
project2.describe: A wine order sharing site, in order to have the best wine at the best price thanks to the Vinoteam community

project3.title: Everetrofit => Weenav
project3.describe: 5-month end-of-training project, a retrofit site that allows the transformation of a thermal vehicle into an electric vehicle

project4.title: Wild-Heroes
project4.describe: Training project 2, a site on super heroes with the use of API
project4.article: Article on the news of superheroes
